snippet: Hit sitcoms and popular movies helped the media giant make up in part for losses in its Time Inc. publishing division. But other charges contributed to a 11 percent drop in net income.
abstract: Hit sitcoms and popular movies helped the media giant make up in part for losses in its Time Inc. publishing division. But other charges contributed to a 11 percent drop in net income.

headline.main: Hit TV Shows and Movies Help Time Warner Offset Losses
headline.print_headline: In a Mixed Quarter, Time Warner Shows Gains
